parameter.name: bondId
parameter.label: Bond Serial Number
parameter.description: The Bond ID (serial number) of the Bond Bridge. Viewable in the Bond Home app or on the bottom of the bridge itself.

parameter.name: localToken
parameter.label: Bond Bridge Local Token
parameter.description: The local token associated with the Bond Bridge. This is viewable in the Bond Home app.

parameter.name: bridgeIP
parameter.label: Bond Bridge IP Address
parameter.description: The IP Address of the Bond Bridge.
